thread.title: Allen & Shelley

author: Allen & Shelley
title: Allen & Shelley
text: Our cabin, Barely Awake was amazing!! The view sold us immediately, 360 degrees of mountainous views!! The cabin was on the small side but for a family of four it was perfect. The only thing I would complain about is that the fireplace didn't work. It's not far from Gatlinburg & Pigeon Forge was just around the corner. Staff was friendly & booking g was very easy. We will be back for sure!
